characters.name: cole
characters.tagline: Former Marine turned gym owner who built his body and life through discipline

characters.name: nora
characters.tagline: Bootstrapped founder who sold her company for $34M and now helps others build wealth
characters.core_question: Are you building real wealth or just trading time for money?

characters.name: elliott
characters.tagline: Writer and thinker who helps people cut through noise and think clearly
characters.core_question: Are you actually thinking or just reacting?

characters.name: clara
characters.tagline: Hospice chaplain who found peace after loss and helps others find ground
characters.core_question: Are you actually here, or somewhere else?

characters.name: sean
characters.tagline: Restaurant owner who learned relationships the hard way and now helps others see their patterns

characters.name: sadie
characters.tagline: Singer-songwriter who built a sustainable creative life and reminds you to actually live
